Definition: This task requires you to read a given text and determine if it contains abusive content. We consider content to be abusive if it contains any negative statements directed at an identity, affiliation, or person. Counter speech that challenges, condemns, or calls out abusive language is also considered abusive. If the text contains abusive content, indicate "yes". Otherwise, indicate "no".
